attributes.additional_details:
Protect the 5.5 Million British Migrants that have moved to other countries.
Opening the Pandorras box of facisim by attacking immigrants with National front slogans exposes our citizens working and living abroad to potential retaliation .

An adult non racist debate is needed about why it is Acceptable for 5.5million British to emigrate but us seen as unacceptable for anyone to wish to work or settle in the finest country in the world.

Current anti immigrants campaigns identify all immigrants as thieves or degenerates or worse.

Our finest British minds have been welcomed here and returned the favour many times over.

Without Immigration we would never of had Winston Churchill (American) , St. George, the English standard (Turkish) etc- leave them alone.
